short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spec Explainer Using Google's PaLM AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spec Explainer is a Chrome extension that uses Google's PaLM AI to explain technical specifications (TC39) with details. Simply click the "Explain" button in the specification document, and SpecsPlain will generate a human-readable explanation of the algorithm.

P.S: For now it works on ecmascript spec
